title: Domestic power demand to grow by 7 pc in FY24: Fitch
description: India's domestic power demand is expected to rise by 7% in 2023-24 due to robust industrial activity, according to Fitch Ratings. The report also predicts that receivable days for Fitch-rated gencos will further shorten in the near term. The strong power demand should keep the average thermal power plant load factor above 60%
